name: NDA/Interview Invitation
description: Combined interview invitation and NDA signing request

example.interviewers:
- Sarah Chen, Engineering Manager
- Mike Thompson, Senior DevOps Engineer
- David Park, VP of Engineering
example.interview_format_details:
The interview will consist of three parts:
1. Introduction and company overview (15 min)
2. Technical discussion and problem-solving (45 min)
3. Behavioral questions and your questions for us (30 min)
example.preparation_notes:
- Review our company website and recent product announcements
- Prepare to discuss your experience with Kubernetes and CI/CD pipelines
- Be ready to walk through a recent infrastructure project you've worked on
- Bring questions about our tech stack, team structure, or company culture
example.nda_instructions: We'll send you a DocuSign link for electronic signature within the next hour. Please complete the signing process before the deadline.
